message: Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's something I've been working on for a long time, and I'm confident it can bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to offer it to you for $950,000. This price represents a fair value considering the potential you stand to gain. I understand this is a significant investment, but I believe it will be worth it in the long run. Let me know what you think.
